languages.text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent
When the wearer scores the first successful {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} on their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target will suffer from {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}. The wearer does not suffer this effect themselves.
languages.original_text:
Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g} — сторонник
Когда персонаж наносит первое {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g} за свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угрозы варпа{/g}. При этом на самого персонажа они не действуют.

traits.locale_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent
When the wearer scores the first successful {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} on their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target will suffer from {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}. The wearer does not suffer this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} themselves.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent
When the wearer scores the first successful {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} on their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target will suffer from {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}. The wearer does not suffer this effect themselves.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}異端者{/g} ― 支持者が必要
着用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で最初の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}がを獲得したとき、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な<歪み>{/g}にさらされる。着用者自身がこの{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を受けることはない。
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent
When the wearer scores the first successful {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} on their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target will suffer from {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}. The wearer does not suffer this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} themselves.

traits.locale_text:
異端者 ― 支持者が必要
着用者のターンで最初の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}クリティカルヒット{/g}を獲得した時、ターゲットは {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な<歪み>{/g}にさらされる。着用者自身がこの効果を受けることはない。

languages.text:
需要信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}——拥护者
当装备者在每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中首次造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}时，会对目标施加{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}。装备者本身不会受到此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}影响。
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent
When the wearer scores the first successful {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} on their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target will suffer from {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}. The wearer does not suffer this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} themselves.

traits.locale_text:
需要信念：异端主义——拥护者
当装备者在每回合中首次造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}暴击{/g}时，会对目标施加{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}。装备者本身不会受到此效果影响。

languages.text:
Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hereje{/g}: Partidario
Cuando el portador asesta el primer {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el objetivo sufre {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g}. El portador no sufre este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent
When the wearer scores the first successful {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} on their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target will suffer from {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}. The wearer does not suffer this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} themselves.

traits.locale_text:
Requiere Hereticus: Partidario
Cuando el portador asesta el primer {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}impacto crítico{/g} de su turno, el objetivo sufre {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g}. El portador no sufre este efecto.

languages.text:
Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Ketzer{/g} – Anhänger
Wenn der Träger in seinem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} den ersten erfolgreichen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} landet, erleidet das Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g}. Der Träger selbst erleidet diesen Effekt nicht.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent
When the wearer scores the first successful {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} on their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target will suffer from {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}. The wearer does not suffer this effect themselves.

traits.locale_text:
Erfordert Haereticus – Anhänger
Wenn der Träger bei seinem Zug den ersten erfolgreichen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}kritischen Treffer{/g} landet, erleidet das Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g}. Der Träger selbst erleidet diesen Effekt nicht.

languages.text:
Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hérétique{/g} — Partisan
Lorsque l'utilisateur porte un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} pour la première fois au cours de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, sa cible subit des {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g}. L'utilisateur est lui-même invulnérable à cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent
When the wearer scores the first successful {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} on their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target will suffer from {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}. The wearer does not suffer this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} themselves.

traits.locale_text:

Lorsque l'utilisateur porte un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}coup critique{/g} pour la première fois au cours de son tour, sa cible subit des {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g}. L'utilisateur est lui-même invulnérable à cet effet.
